stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, forfeit an agenda. Remove 1 bad publicity per agenda point that the forfeited agenda was worth. Gain 1 credit for each bad publicity removed.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, forfeit an agenda.
Remove 1 bad publicity per agenda point that the forfeited agenda was worth. Gain 1[credit] for each bad publicity removed.
title: Sacrifice
